casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Isaac Jackson STROUD. No. 162A95-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. William F.W. Massengale, Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Isaac J. Stroud. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Durham County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
